div.p: KILLING LINCOLN AND JESUS, AND A NEW EDITION WILL BE OUT IN TIME
FOR EASTER. >>> FINALLY, THE FACTOR TIP OF
THE DAY. THERE ARE TWO WEBSITES THAT LIST
UNCLAIMED MONEY OWED TO AMERICAN CITIZEN, MIGHT BE YOU.
WE’VE ANNOUNCED THESE SITES BEFORE, BUT NOW THAT TAX TIME IS
COMING IT IS A GOOD TIME TO TELL YOU ABOUT THEM AGAIN, FIRST ONE
IS UNCLAIMED.ORG. WHICH CONCENTRATES ON THINGS
LIKE REBATES AND PROPERTY TAXES, STUFF YOU MAY NOT BE AWARE OF.
AND THEN THERE IS MISSING MONEY.COM.
ALSO TELLS AMERICANS IF THEY ARE OWED TAX REFUNDS, THINGS LIKE
THAT. SO IT IS WORTH CHECKING IT ALL
OUT. WE HAVE SCORES OF LETTERS FROM
THE FACTOR VIEWERS WHO DID RECEIVE MONEY THEY DIDN’T EVEN
KNOW THEY WERE OWED. ALWAYS A PLUS.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT,
FROM LOS ANGELES. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
